mapper.select: SELECT tbgrant.id ,tbgrant.created_at as createdAt ,tbgrant.modified_at as modifiedAt ,tbgrant.deleted ,tbgrant.title ,tbgrant.cate ,tbgrant.content FROM tbgrant WHERE tbgrant.id = #{id}

SELECT tbgrant.id FROM tbgrant WHERE tbgrant.id is not null AND tbgrant.deleted = #{deleted} AND tbgrant.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') AND tbgrant.cate = #{cate} AND tbgrant.created_at >= CONCAT(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00.000000') AND CONCAT(#{fdate}, ' 23:59:59.999999') >= tbgrant.created_at

SELECT tbgrant.id FROM tbgrant WHERE tbgrant.id is not null AND tbgrant.deleted = #{deleted} AND tbgrant.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') AND tbgrant.cate = #{cate} AND tbgrant.created_at >= CONCAT(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00.000000') AND CONCAT(#{fdate}, ' 23:59:59.999999') >= tbgrant.created_at ORDER BY tbgrant.created_at ORDER BY tbgrant.title ASC DESC LIMIT #{callpage}, #{perpage}

SELECT count(tbgrant.id) as listsize FROM tbgrant WHERE tbgrant.id is not null AND tbgrant.deleted = #{deleted} AND tbgrant.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') AND tbgrant.cate = #{cate} AND tbgrant.created_at >= CONCAT(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00.000000') AND CONCAT(#{fdate}, ' 23:59:59.999999') >= tbgrant.created_at
